Package com.ojcoleman.ahni.hyperneat

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Configurable
    All classes implementing this interface must have a public no-argument constructor.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HyperNEATConfiguration
    Extension of NEAT configuration with HyperNEAT-specific features added: Forces correct number of inputs and outputs according to the number required for the CPPN in the initial ChromosomeMaterial sample from which an initial population is generated. Adds required hidden nodes to the initial ChromosomeMaterial sample from which an initial population is generated if HyperNEATTranscriber.HYPERNEAT_LEO_LOCALITY is enabled.
    HyperNEATEvolver
    Configures and performs an AHNI evolutionary run.
    Properties
    Extension of Properties that provides some convenience methods for retrieving commonly required objects and event communication functionality via AHNIEventListeners.
    Run
    This is the main class from which experiment runs are performed.
